projects.name: Yalla Eat
projects.description: The project aims to develop an online platform similar to the Talabat app, facilitating food and product orders from various stores and restaurants. The system manages transactions between customers, stores, and restaurants, offering a seamless user experience through a user-friendly interface.

projects.name: Game Hub
projects.description: A modern, responsive web application for discovering and exploring free-to-play games across various platforms and genres. Built with vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap, and the Free-to-Play Games Database API.

projects.name: Mealify.
projects.description: a modern and responsive practice project focused on mastering Flexbox layouts, responsive design, and clean code structure. It’s designed to showcase best practices in front-end development while keeping the UI simple, adaptable, and user-friendly.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A sleek, responsive weather application that provides real-time weather conditions and forecasts for cities worldwide.

projects.name: Bookmarker
projects.description: A sleek, modern bookmark manager with theme support and smooth animations. Built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.

projects.name: Quotes Generator
projects.description: A beautiful, responsive web application that displays random inspirational quotes from Goodreads. Built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.

projects.name: Mealify.
projects.description: a modern and responsive practice project focused on mastering Flexbox layouts, responsive design, and clean code structure. It’s designed to showcase best practices in front-end development while keeping the UI simple, adaptable, and user-friendly.

projects.name: Task Management System
projects.description: A productivity application for teams to manage projects and tasks. Features include real-time updates, file sharing, and time tracking.
